extendedInfo.description: Craigslist Mobile provides a simple and intuitive interface, but an extensive set of features to search, post, browser and reply on craigslist.org.What will you find inside?â â The only Android App that allows you to search and post an ads directly from your phone!!â Sophisticated mobilizer algorithm to make the Craigslist webpage fit in the phone screen nicely.â Posting ads directly from your Android Phone.â Posting with or without an account.â Browsing and searching the craigslist.orgâ Quick preview of the posts along with thumbnail of the photos.â Support all major countries and states.â Email the post to friends or yourself.â Contact the poster via email or phone call.â Battery life friendly! No background service to drain your phone's battery.â Save the post to favorite.ââ And more!If you have any question and suggestion, please email us at duduapps@gmail.com. Please include the Category, Location and search keywords when you report any problem.Thanks and enjoy!NOTES on Permissions needed by Craigslist Mobile App:- DIRECTLY CALL PHONE NUMBERS   This feature is only used when you are trying to contact the sellers on the craigslist via phone call.- TAKE PICTURES AND VIDEOS   This feature is only used when you need to post a new ads on craigslist with a picture taking with your phone.

reviews.title: Not so great anymore
reviews.comment: Used to be an excellent app, now it its limited.  no longer able to post listing with the app. I went to cpro from escargot. works like craigslist mobile used to, but slower.
reviews.author: Jon Head

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: This is better than any version of CL for mobile. I use it everyday. It takes 2 minutes to post using this app. Good job guys!
reviews.author: Amanda Burger

reviews.title: Great and efficient.
reviews.comment: Great app...easy to use, professional looking.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No info
reviews.comment: Needs yet another update. Can\'t view the motorcycles for sale and few other categories. Then needs an update for the update to work properly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy to use but
reviews.comment: I tried posting and when I was trying to add a picture it wouldn\'t let me. That\'s a bummer. Fix please. 5 when it works . Thanks
reviews.author: Tomas Campos

reviews.title: Straight garbage
reviews.comment: Long story short, you type in your filter parameters and this app will do none of it. Recent posts come up as best matches and so on. Uninstalling NOW!
reviews.author: Fabian Alicea

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great for quick search love the app need to remove expired posts make menu option to remove post 5 stars
reviews.author: Matthew Nastasi

reviews.title: Buggy on my blaze 4g
reviews.comment: For some reason, this app updates once in a while and then either works or does not. Sometimes it allows me to post new ads/upload images.. Other times, after an \"update\" it experiences some issues. ((Scratches head with confusion))  6/24/13** still not uploading images. New posts are problematic
reviews.author: David Alfaro

reviews.title: Can\'t list!  Keep running into black screens
reviews.comment: Can\'t get a listing finished. I get my description in and continue and loads to a black screen. Can upload pics from laptop but not my galaxy nexus. Do wish it would automatically cap the first letter of sentences.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t post after update
reviews.comment: Used to work great then an update or two ago it blacked out my posting page.  Can no longer post to craigslist from this app on my galaxy s4.  Will give five stars once again if fixed.  Already tried to uninstall and reinstall to no avail.
reviews.author: Patrick Buckmaster

reviews.title: Crap, won\'t post anymore.  FIX NOW!
reviews.comment: It finally worked fine and you all had to screw with it didn\'t you
reviews.author: Brent Hickenbotham

reviews.title: Can\'t post
reviews.comment: It won\'t let me post an ad, so I\'m using the other app in the play store. I actually like it a lot better. I loved it until the last update.
reviews.author: Ashley Welch

reviews.title: Great app, easy
reviews.comment: Changed my review. Searching is fine, but what happened to the \"posting\" part? It used to be easy, now it\'s complicated and it won\'t let me take pictures from my phone or let me upload pictures. Please fix. Trying another one until you do.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cant upload pics.
reviews.comment: Nobody will purchase from you if youre selling something without images. This is kind of a crucial feature to not work. On a Galaxy S2. Works fine other than that
reviews.author: Michiah Stone

reviews.title: Ughhhh!!!
reviews.comment: I used to luv this app. But now, i cant post any ads n if i can post, i cant add any pics. And when i browse thru catergories or search an item/city/etc, itll only show 100 posts, not all. This really sucks...fix asap so i can post my ads again and ill give a better review
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was great
reviews.comment: Suddenly, the post page doesn\'t load. It\'s a big hassle to use the over key and go through each aspect of the post from city all the way to description, then publish after crgslist sends you an email....wish that page would load. I have 2 phones, 2 providers, seperate, yet still the same. Nothing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy s4
reviews.comment: Great app except after updates it works for about 2 weeks then all the adds never load up so it becomes useless til the next update ik is not my phone cause it was the same case on an HTC thunderbolt and Iphone 4 gotta fix that our there\'s really no point in having the app I\'ll give 5 stars when it works right cause right after updates I\'m on it all day shopping for deals
reviews.author: Kris Marsh

reviews.title: What happened
reviews.comment: App was working great up until a couple weeks ago . Now sometimes pictures no dates. Takes longer to load. Please fix it
reviews.author: hawk levy
